div.p: The element GENERICRANGE is designed to work only within AUTHORSUMMARY statements (which are composed in the WRITING section of entries but displayed on the OVERVIEW screen). It cannot be used elsewhere. It takes in a sentence or sentences discussing a writer's whole oeuvre and the kind of generic choices she made over her lifetime. It has no allowable sub-elements or attributes.

div.codeblock: Anne Clifford's known writings fall into two groups: the diaries she kept as a young woman, and the writings of her old age, which mix diary, autobiography, and writing about her family.
